physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Anxious appearance; diffusely enlarged, slightly irregular, and very firm thyroid gland estimated at 60 g.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid appeared larger and firmer (estimated weight 80 g) five months later.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Excruciating neck pain and compressive symptoms with a thyroid gland weighing 80 g.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Goiter size was unchanged at subsequent examination two months later.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Unconsciousness; paresthesias and numbness in hands, feet, and face; low serum calcium at 1.4 mmol/liter; very low intact PTH.
Pain in right lobe of thyroid; progressive difficulty in breathing; computerized tomography showed massively enlarged thyroid compressing internal jugular vein and trachea.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid became woody hard and fibrotic.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Right Horner's syndrome with ptosis and meiosis; hoarseness; right vocal cord paralysis noted on laryngoscopy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Horner's syndrome was resolved with treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Remarkable improvement; no compressive symptoms; residual mild hoarseness.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid size markedly reduced; no compressive symptoms.
